Description: Key Job Accountabilities•   Assess project risk and consider appropriate risk mitigation solutions to prevent any potential impact on project delivery.•   Conduct reviews of technical specifications, drawings, and technical documents to ensure they reflect the engineering requirements and comply with regulatory and international standards.•   Develop guidelines in the area of expertise for investigations and evaluations.•   Test, monitor and support the improvement of efficiency of systems and processes.•   Assess technical deviations and recommend decisions in their specific discipline.•   Assist in the coordination of quality assurance / quality control functions in the section / division.•   Undertake project cost analysis to accurately estimate costs.Skills
Skills: •   Provide constructability input to new plant/facility modification projects and drive for flawless projects execution/completion and ensure engineering activities are conducted in accordance with regulatory requirements.
•   8 years’ experience in the area of specialization within Oil and Gas Environment.
•   Computer literate, with advanced knowledge of all relevant engineering software tools, systems and tools.
•   Fluent in English language (demonstrated verbal and written skills).
